Title: Tsukumo Sana
GameText:
Power - Space Incarnate: Sana deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Sana deals each target other than that target 1 melee damage..
ðŸŒŸ = this card's current HP divided by 10 rounded up

- Destroy an environment card, then each target deals itself 1 fixed melee damage.
- 1 hero target deals 1 target 2 cold damage.
- 1 hero plays an Ongoing card.

Title: Sana's Limiter
GameText:
This card's allies are immune to melee damage dealt by Sana.
When this card is destroyed, either destroy 1 Environment target or this card deals each Hero target 1 melee damage.
Quote: "Without my limiter, I would grow too big and destroy the earth! Do you want to see, chat?"

Title: Beeg!
GameText:
+1 to ðŸŒŸ
+1 HP recovery for Sana.
POWER: Sana regains 2 HP. Draw 1 card.
Quote: "In my human form, Sana is 169 cm tall, but I'm actually 16978400000000 cm tall!"

Title: Contingency Plan
GameText:
After Sana's Limiter is destroyed, you may summon Sana's Limiter. If you do, destroy this card.
POWER: Summon Sana's Limiter or discover 1 target card.
POWER PHASE
You may use an additional power this phase.
Quote: "You guys would still eat me if I was toast, right?"

Title: Cosmic Presence
GameText: POWER: Either draw 2 cards or play 1 card. If you played a card, Sana deals each target 1 melee damage.
Quote: "Sana is eternal. Sana is an all present constant being that can never truly be lost."

Title: Destructive Growth
GameText:
Sana regains 2 HP.
Sana deals each non-Hero target ðŸŒŸ melee damage.
If ðŸŒŸ is 3 or more, play 1 card. Otherwise, Sana regains 3 HP.

Title: I'm Not Alone
GameText:
Summon 1 target card.
Each Hero draws 1 card.
Quote: Till like a comet you came into my orbit      I know, I'm not alone

Title: Neighbula
GameText:
END PHASE
Each Hero may discard 1 card. For each card discarded this way, 1 Hero may draw 1 card and Sana regains 1 HP.
Quote: "You are not giving Sana enough headpats!!"

Title: Planetary Dango
GameText: REACTION: Sana may regain 2 HP or you may play 1 card. If you played a card, Sana deals each target 1 melee damage.
Quote: "They've already conquered the planets in my hair and are getting ready to start a full-scale galactic war on each other."

Title: Planetary Dango
GameText: REACTION: Sana may regain 2 HP or you may play 1 card. If you played a card, Sana deals each target 1 melee damage.
Quote: "It's pretty intense. I probably don't want to be in the middle of that."

Title: Promise of Space
GameText:
-1 damage dealt to Sana
You may redirect damage dealt to Hero characters to Sana.
START PHASE
Sana regains 4 HP. Destroy this card.
Quote: "Look how small the Earth is! You guys are so cute!"

Title: Sana is BEEG!
GameText:
Sana regains 2 HP.
Sana deals 1 target 1 + ðŸŒŸ irreducible melee damage.
If ðŸŒŸ is 3 or more, play 1 card. Otherwise, Sana regains 3 HP.
Quote: "Back when I was at my full size, I had to conquer around 50,000 water planets to take a bath. So I have it pretty good on Earth."

Title: Sana Landing!
GameText:
Draw 2 cards.
Either summon Sana's Limiter or discover 1 Ongoing card.
Quote: "I see the light! I must go to hololiiiive!"

Title: Sanallite
GameText:
Play this in a Hero's play area.
After this card is played, if it was played from your hand, you may discover 1 target.
This card is immune to melee damage dealt by Sana.
END PHASE
Either that Hero draws 1 card or 1 target in this play area regains 1 HP.
Quote: Though we've just begun                        I know we'll make it cos somehow          The universe is fun now

Title: Sizeable Support
GameText:
Sana and one ally Hero character each draw 1 card and regain 2 HP.
That ally Hero may play 1 card.
Quote: When our hearts grow bigger than the sun There's no challenge we can't overcome

Title: Sneeze
GameText:
Sana deals Sana's Limiter 3 fixed melee damage.
Sana deals each Hero target 2 melee damage.
You may use 1 power.
Quote: "If I sneeze, all the Earth's volcanoes will erupt apparently... But it's okay!"

Title: The Council - Space
GameText:
After this card is played, either summon Sana's Limiter or draw 2 cards.
After Sana's Limiter is destroyed, each Hero draws 1 card.
POWER: Collect 1 Ongoing card. You may destroy Sana's Limiter. If you do, play 1 card.
Quote: "Uh, her size limiter was removed before     this, so I had to take drastic measures."   "I'm outside guys! Sana! Is! BEEG!"
